Crystal Mountain Ski Resort Web Site
directions: Crystal Mountain is accessed from Highway 97 at the Glenrosa exit in Westbank.  This exit is located between Westbank and Peachland, just north of the Connector and Highway 97 junction.  Signs from both directions indicate the Glenrosa exit. Continue to drive another 10 km along Glenrosa Road, with no further exits.  This road is right to Crystal Mountain and is maintained by the Province.  Please call us at (250) 768-5189 if you require assistance.
title: Crystal Mountain Ski Resort
